title.rendered: Regent College London BA Business Management (Top-up)

content.rendered: We would like to give all our new starts in the BA Business Management (Top-up) a warm welcome today and wish them all the luck throughout their studies. This program has been designed specifically to provide our students with the knowledge and practical application they need to succeed in today’s business environment. We can’t wait to see the transformation of our students and their journey in becoming future leaders.
